sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_favorite ( id char(32) not null, favoriteid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, primary key(id), unique(favoriteid, userid) );

create table sf_favorite_item ( id char(32) not null, favoritemark int4 not null, contentid char(32) not null, topic varchar(128) not null, url varchar(128) not null, favorites int4 not null, categoryid char(32), description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique(favoritemark, contentid) );
